lead_paragraph: The Canadians Charles Hamelin and Kalyna Roberge won the 500-meter races at the short-track speedskating world championships yesterday in Milan. The Olympic champion Apolo Anton Ohno was disqualified from the first semifinal heat.
snippet: The Canadians Charles Hamelin and Kalyna Roberge won the 500-meter races at the short-track speedskating world championships yesterday in Milan. The Olympic champion Apolo Anton Ohno was disqualified from the first semifinal heat.
